thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superb choice of hotel
thread.title_full: Superb choice of hotel - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Lurgurial
title: Superb choice of hotel
text:
Just spent four nights at the Artemide in a family group of eight. Beautiful, spotless hotel with a seamless blend of modern decor with marble floors and stairs. Generous, well furnished rooms with super-King beds. Sumptuous breakfasts, and superb dining. Extremely friendly and helpful staff who seemed to take pleasure in helping with any query or request. Our four rooms were all together as requested.
The hotel is also very well positioned with all the main tourist attractions in Rome within walking distance or a short ride. Restaurants and bars everywhere. I hadn't realised just how beautiful central Rome is and although busy the traffic is nothing compared with London.
Thoroughly recommend both Rome and the Artemide.
